Custom Enum Types¶

CommonEnumFloat¶

class CommonEnumFloat(enum_name: str, enum_value: float, class_name: str)¶

Bases: float

An enum that holds a float value.

property name¶

The name of the enum.

Returns

The name of this enum.

property value¶

The value of the enum.

Returns

The value of the enum.

CommonEnumFloatBase¶

class CommonEnumFloatBase¶

Bases: float

A base class for float enums.
